Package expr

Class SymbolTable

java.lang.Object
expr.SymbolTable
public class SymbolTable
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to store all the attributions of the program. It consists of an ArrayList.

    • add

    • valueof

      public int valueof​(Id id)
      This method iterates over the array looking for the element that have the given id. Once this element is found this method returns its value. I.e: Consider: a:INT=1; Given 'a' as the id this method will return 1.
      Parameters:
      id - id is the name of the variable.
      Returns:
      Returns the value inside the given variable
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - If the given id can't be found this method throws a NullPointerException showing that the given id doesn't exist.

    • check

      public boolean check​(Id id)
      Boolean method to check if a given id exists or not.
      Parameters:
      id - id is the name of the variable
      Returns:
      Returns true if the id exists or false if it doesn't
